metadata.title: CVE-2023-39328 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenJPEG similar to CVE-2019-6988. This flawallows an attacker to bypass existing protections and cause an applicationcrash through a maliciously crafted file.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2025-02-12').
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
ghostscript package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
openjpeg package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
